creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: rectangular box with scenes from the Tale of Genji painted on outside; on cover: male and female figure inside building looking out over verandah onto snow-covered rocks and a stream; on one side, female figure in green and red robes lays on her stomach on verandah looking wistfully toward man in white who is seated on the ground; on opposite side, a young woman and two other figures inside on green matting; blossoming tree nearby; inside is gold painted with white chrysanthemums
medium: Painted wooden writing box; ink and color on gilded wood
title: Writing box with Scenes from the "Morning Glory," "Picture Contest," and "Ivy" chapters of the Tale of Genji
